title: Google\Cloud\Bigtable\V2\Row
name: Row
description:
Specifies the complete (requested) contents of a single row of a table.

Rows which exceed 256MiB in size cannot be read in full.

Generated from protobuf message google.bigtable.v2.Row

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.key
params.description: The unique key which identifies this row within its table. This is the same key that's used to identify the row in, for example, a MutateRowRequest. May contain any non-empty byte string up to 4KiB in length.

params.name: data.families
params.description: May be empty, but only if the entire row is empty. The mutual ordering of column families is not specified.

methods.name: getKey
methods.description:
The unique key which identifies this row within its table. This is the same key that's used to identify the row in, for example, a MutateRowRequest.

May contain any non-empty byte string up to 4KiB in length.
